io.bretty.console.view

Interface IndexNumberFormatter

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultIndexNumberFormatter

    public interface IndexNumberFormatter

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String format(int index)
      Given an index number of menu items in a menu (starting from 0), format it to a string.

    • Method Detail

      • format

        java.lang.String format(int index)
        Given an index number of menu items in a menu (starting from 0), format it to a string. See DefaultIndexNumberFormatter for example
        Parameters:
        index - the index number of a menu item in a menu (starting from 0)
        Returns:
        a string that is to be printed in the same line as, and in front of the menu time description
